title: Taehwan (Jack) Kim
text: Greetings! I’m Jack. Junior and Economics major at Pomona College. Formerly of Class of 2024, finally back at school after serving in the Republic of Korea Army Special Forces. My interest lies in the world of finance and value investing. Love to play soccer (lifelong Arsenal fan) and love to share my military endeavors.

title: Case Analysis 2: Premier League 2021-2022
text:
TidyTuesday Reference
Original Data Source
Objective of the Analysis: Which referee gave out the most yellow cards to Arsenal during the 2021-2022 season?
Refereeing decisions play huge outcome in a football match. In fact, fans and analysts alike do pay enormous attention to the designated referee for each fixture. As a lifelong Arsenal fan, I wanted to find out which referees tend to be harsher on Arsenal.









The bar chart represents the total number of yellow cards each referee has given to Arsenal. Craig Pawson handed out the most yellow cards to Arsenal, with 9 cards given.

title: Case Analysis 1: Olympics
text:
TidyTuesday Reference
Original Data Source
Objective: Usually it is the Olympic athletes that receive the fame. However, at the end of the day they each represent their country with pride. Let’s find out which nations are represented the most in the top 10 most successful athlete list (measured by medal count). So, which countries have produced the best talents?


# A tibble: 10 × 3
   name                                                team         total_medals
   <chr>                                               <chr>               <int>
 1 "Michael Fred Phelps, II"                           United Stat…           28
 2 "Larysa Semenivna Latynina (Diriy-)"                Soviet Union           18
 3 "Nikolay Yefimovich Andrianov"                      Soviet Union           15
 4 "Borys Anfiyanovych Shakhlin"                       Soviet Union           13
 5 "Edoardo Mangiarotti"                               Italy                  13
 6 "Ole Einar Bjrndalen"                               Norway                 13
 7 "Takashi Ono"                                       Japan                  13
 8 "Aleksey Yuryevich Nemov"                           Russia                 12
 9 "Dara Grace Torres (-Hoffman, -Minas)"              United Stat…           12
10 "Jennifer Elisabeth \"Jenny\" Thompson (-Cumpelik)" United Stat…           12


# A tibble: 6 × 2
  team          count
  <chr>         <int>
1 Soviet Union      3
2 United States     3
3 Italy             1
4 Japan             1
5 Norway            1
6 Russia            1











USSR and United States produced the highest number of most successful athletes. Russia (formerly USSR) and the US usually rank top 3 for medal counts. It is actually surprising to find China not represented in the list.
As for most successful athletes, Michael Phelps is by far has won the most medals (28).
